attributes.action: Commit to consistent, higher standards of waste recycling services across the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Recently I moved half an hour down the road from a Council area had excellent recycling levels to one which collects by comparison very minimal amounts. Having developed good recycling habits I was now in a position where I no longer was able to recycle many of the items I previously had done.

If UK Gov is serious about tackling waste and recycling (it should be) then do more than just impose levies on plastic bags and bottles - impose higher standards of recycling facilities across the UK.
attributes.background: The Government should ensure levels of waste recycling are consistently high throughout the UK regardless of where you live and not dependent upon local council policies. Currently it's a postcode lottery. Some councils provide excellent services and the others minimal amounts. This must change.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you would like to improve waste recycling, but are not sure what improvements you would like the Government or Parliament to make.

You could start a new petition asking for specific improvements to be made to waste recycling, if that is something you would like to see happen.
